title: Erigon BSC testnet don't synchronize
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.09.1-alpha-4067b7c4`
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash :  4067b7c4da6c5d741d3027d95ae2afdf6b7a943a

#### Expected behaviour
Successful sync BSC testnet

#### Actual behaviour
````
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:50.292] Starting Erigon on Chapel testnet...
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:50.293] Maximum peer count                       ETH=100 total=100
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:50.293] starting HTTP APIs                       APIs=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:50.293] torrent verbosity                        level=WRN
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.394] Set global gas cap                       cap=50000000
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.401] Opening Database                         label=chaindata path=/data/chaindata
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.406] Re-Opening DB in exclusive mode to apply migrations
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.409] Apply migration                          name=db_schema_version5
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.409] Applied migration                        name=db_schema_version5
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.409] Apply migration                          name=txs_begin_end
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.410] Applied migration                        name=txs_begin_end
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.410] Apply migration                          name=reset_blocks_3
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.410] Applied migration                        name=reset_blocks_3
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.410] Updated DB schema to                     version=6.0.0
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.418] Writing custom genesis block             hash=0x87a1a5da20fa73e63f4cacb3b440711b64e678013149a47193b3a5599455a352
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.418] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 1417 Ramanujan: 400, Niels: 0, MirrorSync: 400, Bruno: 400, Euler: <nil>, Engine: parlia}" genesis=0x87a1a5da20fa73e63f4cacb3b440711b64e678013149a47193b3a5599455a352
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.419] Effective                                prune_flags="--prune.h.older=90000 --prune.r.older=90000 --prune.t.older=90000 --prune.c.older=90000" snapshot_flags= history.v2=false
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.419] Initialising Ethereum protocol           network=97
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.424] Starting private RPC server              on=127.0.0.1:9090
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] new subscription to logs established
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] rpc filters: subscribing to Erigon events
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] new subscription to newHeaders established
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] New txs subscriber joined
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] Reading JWT secret                       path=/data/jwt.hex
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] Generated JWT secret                     path=/data/jwt.hex
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] HTTP endpoint opened for Engine API      url=localhost:8551 ws=true ws.compression=true
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.425] HTTP endpoint opened                     url=0.0.0.0:8545 ws=true ws.compression=true grpc=false
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.429] Started P2P networking                   version=66 self=enode://050647e6e732a93646eb7e428b1ea4185b92abb3604929b0fb6a633c88e95cf600cdcff2b70e9df52d37fb987f8c0c5140291094600768df3ed5e8fbc7d2b334@127.0.0.1:30303 name=erigon/v2022.09.1-alpha-4067b7c4/linux-amd64/go1.18.5
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.435] [txpool] Started
[INFO] [09-08|03:39:52.435] [1/15 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=0
[INFO] [09-08|03:40:52.426] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=0 baseFee=0 queued=0 alloc=25.8MB sys=59.2MB
[INFO] [09-08|03:41:32.436] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=0 respMin=0 respMax=0 dups=0
[INFO] [09-08|03:41:32.436] Queue sizes                              anchors=0 links=0 persisted=1
[INFO] [09-08|03:41:52.420] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=0
[INFO] [09-08|03:41:52.425] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=0 baseFee=0 queued=0 alloc=24.7MB sys=59.5MB
[INFO] [09-08|03:41:52.436] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=0 respMin=0 respMax=0 dups=0
[INFO] [09-08|03:41:52.436] Queue sizes                              anchors=0 links=0 persisted=1
[INFO] [09-08|03:42:12.436] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=0 respMin=0 respMax=0 dups=0
[INFO] [09-08|03:42:12.436] Queue sizes                              anchors=0 links=0 persisted=1
````
Imho erigon tries to sync another  testnet

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
run erigon with these params: `erigon --datadir=/data --chain=rialto --networkid=97 --port=30303 --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 --http --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.vhosts=* --http.port=8545 --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon --ws --snapshots=false --prune=htrc`
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
